item.title: Enjoy a complimentary stay at a luxurious hotel in Doha when you transit overnight with Qatar Airways
item.description:
Source: Qatar Airways. Doha skyline. Qatar Airways has teamed up with Qatar Tourism Authority (QTA) to launch a stopover package, aiming to highlight Qatar as a top destination for travelers. The package allows transit passengers to explore Doha with complimentary luxury hotel stays and transit visas. This unique deal is part of their larger “+Qatar” campaign, encouraging those passing through to consider extending their trip. The promotion invites all Qatar Airways transit passengers to include Doha in their travel plans by offering a free one-night stay at some of the country’s top four- and five-star hotels in the capital...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enjoy-a-complimentary-stay-at-a-luxurious-hotel-in-doha-when-you-transit-overnight-with-qatar-airways/

item.title: Complimentary stopovers offered to Etihad Economy Class passengers traveling from the Middle East, Africa, and Pakistan
item.description:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the UAE, is offering a complimentary one-night stay at the Radisson Blu hotel on Abu Dhabi’s Yas Island. This offer is open to Economy Class passengers flying from the Middle East, Africa, and Pakistan who have a layover in Abu Dhabi. Mohammad Al Bulooki, Etihad Airways Executive VP Commercial, expressed the airline’s enthusiasm for showcasing Abu Dhabi to its guests. He highlighted the diverse attractions of the UAE capital, ranging from cultural landmarks and beaches to sports and adventure activities...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/complimentary-stopovers-offered-to-etihad-economy-class-passengers-traveling-from-the-middle-east-africa-and-pakistan/
